title: Talking parrot Tillie Ryan pesters its owner to play Peekaboo before 'kissing' the camera screen
text:
An adorable parrot repeatedly asked its owner to play Peekaboo before blowing the camera a kiss goodnight.

Tillie Ryan, a Hahn's macaw parrot, was sat on her owner's shoulder in Montgomery, Texas.

In the video, the green-feathered bird asks: 'Do you want to play peekaboo?'

Tillie Ryan, a Hahn's macaw parrot, repeatedly asked its owner to play Peekaboo before blowing the camera a kiss goodnight in Montgomery, Texas

Her owner replies: 'No, I don't want to play peekaboo.'

Tillie Ryan goes on to ask again and her owner repeatedly declines the offer.

Eventually, her owner says: 'No, it's time to go night night.'

When Tillie Ryan asks three more times, her owner relents and says: 'Okay fine, peekaboo!'

Tillie Ryan asks again and her owner repeatedly declines the offer. Eventually, her owner says: 'No, it's time to go night night'

The footage then cuts to Tillie Ryan moving her head from side to side saying 'peekaboo'.

Her owner replies: 'No, I'm not playing peekaboo.'

A bemused Tillie Ryan replies: 'No?'

Her owner asks: 'Do you want to go night night? Tell everybody "night night".'

She then instructs the bird to 'blow them kisses'.

The footage then cuts to Tillie Ryan moving her head from side to side before saying 'peekaboo'. Her owner replies: 'No, I'm not playing peekaboo'

The bird leans towards the camera and blows two kisses to the lens.

This is not the first time a talking parrot has become a nuisance to its owner.

In December last year, Rocco the parrot accidentally placed orders on Amazon by chatting to voice-activated personal assistant Alexa.

The African Grey 'bought' a range of fruit and veg – including water melons, raisins and broccoli – ice cream, a light bulb and even a kite.

Her owner then instructs the bird to 'blow them kisses'. The bird leans towards the camera and blows two kisses to the lens

In December last year, Rocco the parrot accidentally placed orders on Amazon by chatting to voice-activated personal assistant Alexa
description: Hahn's macaw parrot Tillie Ryan was sat on her owner's shoulder in Montgomery, Texas, in the adorable footage. The green-feathered bird asks: 'Do you want to play peekaboo?'
